physical_appearance: The image shows a rectangular photograph that is in black-and-white. A man and a woman are featured in the photograph. The woman is dressed in her ethnic costume and holding onto an infant on her lap. The man is wearing a short sleeved shirt, pants, and covered shoes. Both of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. The background of the photograph suggests that this was taken in the interior of a building.
title_text: Krishnasamy and Malaiammal with their child, Kaliappan Photograph of Krishnasamy and Malaiammal with their child, Kaliappan
